languages.text: "Арбитр не должен выглядеть слабым и уязвимым". {n}Упрямо сжав губы, Соломон свирепо смотрит в пустоту.{/n} "По мне судят о силе Империума и твердости его хватки".

"An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."
languages.original_text: "Арбитр не должен выглядеть слабым и уязвимым". {n}Упрямо сжав губы, Соломон свирепо смотрит в пустоту.{/n} "По мне судят о силе Империума и твердости его хватки".

traits.locale_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

"An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

"An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

"An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

"An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

languages.text: « Un arbitrator ne doit pas paraître faible ou vulnérable. » {n}Serrant obstinément les lèvres, Solomorne regarde droit devant lui d'un air sombre.{/n} « Je suis la jauge par laquelle on juge la force de l'Imperium et son emprise sur la galaxie. »
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: « Un arbitrator ne doit pas paraître faible ou vulnérable. » {n}Serrant obstinément les lèvres, Solomorne regarde droit devant lui d'un air sombre.{/n} « Je suis la jauge par laquelle on juge la force de l'Imperium et son emprise sur la galaxie. »

languages.text: 「アービトレイターは、弱さや脆さを見せてはいけません」{n}ソロモーンは頑なに唇を引き結び、目前の虚空をにらみつけた。{/n}「私は、帝国がいかに強く銀河を支配しているかを示す『基準』なのです」
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターは、弱さや脆さを見せてはいけません」{n}ソロモーンは頑なに唇を引き結び、目前の虚空をにらみつけた。{/n}「私は、帝国がいかに強く銀河を支配しているかを示す『基準』なのです」

languages.text: «Un Arbitrator no puede mostrarse débil ni vulnerable». {n}Solomorne aprieta los labios y fulmina el aire con la mirada.{/n} «Soy la vara por la que se mide la fuerza y el poder con los que el Imperium domina la galaxia».
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: «Un Arbitrator no puede mostrarse débil ni vulnerable». {n}Solomorne aprieta los labios y fulmina el aire con la mirada.{/n} «Soy la vara por la que se mide la fuerza y el poder con los que el Imperium domina la galaxia».

languages.text: “法务官不该让自己看起来有一丝软弱。”{n}索罗蒙固执地抿紧了嘴唇，凝视着眼前的空气。{/n}“我就像一面镜子，映照着帝国的力量，以及帝国对银河系的铁腕统治。”
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: “法务官不该让自己看起来有一丝软弱。”{n}索罗蒙固执地抿紧了嘴唇，凝视着眼前的空气。{/n}“我就像一面镜子，映照着帝国的力量，以及帝国对银河系的铁腕统治。”

languages.text: "Bir Yargıcı asla zayıf veya savunmasız görünmemeli." {n}Solomorne, dudaklarını birbirine bastırıp boşluğa bakıyor.{/n} "Ben, İmparatorluk'un gücünün ve galaksideki hâkimiyetinin simgesiyim."
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Yargıcı asla zayıf veya savunmasız görünmemeli." {n}Solomorne dudaklarını birbirine bastırıp boşluğa bakıyor.{/n} "Ben, İmparatorluk'un gücü ve galaksi üzerindeki hâkimiyetinin simgesiyim."

languages.text: "Ein Arbitrator darf keine Schwäche oder Verwundbarkeit zeigen." {n}Solomorne presst trotzig die Lippen aufeinander und blickt in die Leere vor sich.{/n} "Ich bin das Maß, an dem das Imperium hinsichtlich seiner Stärke und seiner Kontrolle über die Galaxie gemessen wird."
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator must not appear weak or vulnerable." {n}Stubbornly pressing his lips together, Solomorne glares at the empty air before him.{/n} "I am the gauge by which the Imperium is judged on its strength and its grip on the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Arbitrator darf keine Schwäche oder Verwundbarkeit zeigen." {n}Solomorne presst trotzig die Lippen aufeinander und blickt in die Leere vor sich.{/n} "Ich bin das Maß, an dem das Imperium hinsichtlich seiner Stärke und seiner Kontrolle über die Galaxie gemessen wird."
